channel.title: Alexander Zaidelson on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Compliance And Confidentiality
item.description: Compliance and confidentiality: can they co-exist? Alexander Zaidelson, Beam Introduction Hi everyone. It’s a great pleasure to be here. I’m Alexander Zaidelson, CEO of Beam. I’ll be presenting our view on the regulation and how we live with it as a project. I’m not an expert in regulation. Whatever I’m showing here is how we see the landscape from what we understand. Beam is a confidential transaction. The question is, how can confidential cryptocurrency co-exist with regulation?
